comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: Men of the Hehe tribe, of Iringa Dstrict, dressed in traditional garb, assembled at Kalenga for the occasion of the ceremonial return by the Governor, Sir Edward Twining, of the skull of the former Hehe warrior chief Mkwawa which had been taken to Germany after Mkwawa's death in 1898. The date was 9 June 1954.
